name: Cavel Ex
description:
Cavel Ex:

The idea was to create a game for two groups of people, teenage boys and men in their mid 30s who want to play an exploring game.

The game switches from 2D for traveling and 3D for combat and fighting Creatures. 

Controls:

For 2D environment:

A,S,W,D Keys to move around.

For 3D environment:

A,S,W,D Keys to move around.

Left mouse click to attack.

Roles I did:

3D Modeling, 2D Prototype Art (Except the map), Level design for both 2D and 3D levels.
